mapper.select: SELECT PUR_INQ_NO, PUR_INQ_DATE, PUR_INQ_TITLE, PUR_INQ_CONTENT, PUR_INQ_CHECK, PRO_NO, PUR_INQ_FILENAME, USER_ID FROM PURCHASE_INQURIY where user_id = #{user_id}

select i.PUR_INQ_NO, i.PUR_INQ_DATE, i.PUR_INQ_TITLE, i.PUR_INQ_CONTENT, i.PUR_INQ_CHECK, p.PRO_NO, i.PUR_INQ_FILENAME, i.USER_ID from product p inner join purchase_inquriy i on(p.pro_no = i.pro_no) where p.user_id = #{user_id}
